pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'emailjs' Support // Use 'emailjs' API easily in 'R'. This package is not official. https://www.emailjs.com/docs/rest- api/send/. You can send e-mail with 'emailjs' with function, based on 'httr'. You can also make a 'shiny' ui and server function. It can be used for making feedback form, inquiry, and so on.
